product: Endpoint Manager Cloud Service Appliance (EPM CSA)
shortDescription: Path traversal in Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to bypass restrictions.
vulnerabilityName: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Cloud Service Appliance (EPM CSA) Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
